entry.title: Roadmap/schedules
entry.summary: The conversation between individuals appears to be about upgrades for a certain system. The speaker mentions that some nodes don't look good, and the upgrade alerts are necessary. The discussion moves towards research in this area, but it is unclear if any progress has been made. The group then raises concerns about new code causing critical section deadlocks, and suggests implementing locks that track ordering relative to other locks. They also mention that running ThreadSanitizer might help identify thread safety issues.
